data.title: suite · GitHub Topics · GitHub
data.meta_description: GitHub is where people build software. More than 100 million people use GitHub to discover, fork, and contribute to over 420 million projects.
data.text:
The JTS Topology Suite is a Java library for creating and manipulating vector geometry.

A .NET GIS solution that is fast and reliable for the .NET platform.

A library with a JsonSerializer and a set of annotations to serialize any PoJo as GeoJSON.
